data.name: ReadFundTransaction
data.value: select top(1) FTT_IDENTIFIER, PCA_CODE, PCA_EFFECTIVE_DATE, FUN_IDENTIFIER, FUND_TRANS_ID from CKT_FUND_TRANS where (FUND_TRANS_ID = @fundTransId) and (FTT_IDENTIFIER = @fttIdentifier) and (FUN_IDENTIFIER = @funIdentifier) and (PCA_CODE = @pcaCode)

data.name: ReadFundTransactionStatus
data.value: select top(1) FUND_TRANS_STAT_ID from CKT_FUND_TRANSTAT where FUND_TRANS_STAT_ID = @fundTransStatId

data.name: ReadFundTransactionStatusFundTransactionStatusHistory
data.value: select top(1) FTS_IDENTIFIER, FTR_IDENTIFIER, FUN_IDENTIFIER, PCA_EFFECTIVE_DATE, PCA_CODE, FTT_IDENTIFIER, EFFECTIVE_TMST, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, REASON_TEXT from CKT_FUND_TRNSTATHS where (@ftrIdentifier = FTR_IDENTIFIER) and (@funIdentifier = FUN_IDENTIFIER) and (@fttIdentifier = FTT_IDENTIFIER) and (@pcaEffectiveDate = PCA_EFFECTIVE_DATE) and (@pcaCode = PCA_CODE) order by CREATED_TIMESTAMP desc
